name: ImPerfection (zenonelissen)
description:
A game that reflects the imperfection of life, and as a perfectionist it's sometimes hard to have things go the way you don't want them to go.
This game in made with mistakes in mind (spelling mistakes, unsymmetrical objects, ect)

The purpose of the game is to finish all the tasks before leaving, but that seems harder than it looks. 

Because things don't always work out in the way you want them to go!

This game is also impossible to beat, just so you know ;)
